channel.title: [Req] Linux ran.sh, Having a problem with mine
channel.description:
The current run.sh i have for my server has problems whenever it tries to load any cfg's, im guessing this is the script itself.
Can anyone copypasta their working ones :rolleyes:

item.title: [Req] Linux ran.sh, Having a problem with mine
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I believe you need to change the directories Java loads the files from as Linux uses different directory routing from windows?

Just post the code which allowed Java to read the files.

Read full topic
item.source: [Req] Linux ran.sh, Having a problem with mine
